name: voidauth
description: Voidauth is a self-hosted authentication and authorization service that handles user registration, login, and token-based access for multiple applications through a web UI and REST API.
features: User authentication: Handle user registration, login, and password management for applications.
Token-based auth: Issue JWT tokens for stateless authentication across services.
Multi-application: Manage authentication for multiple applications from one service.
User management: Create and manage user accounts through web UI and API.
Role-based access: Define roles and permissions to control access to resources.
OAuth2 support: Provide OAuth2 authentication for third-party application integration.
Session management: Track active sessions and provide logout functionality.
Password policies: Enforce password complexity and expiration requirements.
Two-factor authentication: Add extra security with optional 2FA support.
API integration: Integrate authentication into applications using REST API.
Admin dashboard: Manage users, roles, and settings through web administration panel.
Audit logging: Track authentication events and user actions for security monitoring.
